cell1.title: First Cell
cell1.description: Radio parameters of the first cell of ORS Duo

cell2.title: Second Cell
cell2.description: Radio parameters of the second cell of ORS Duo when using Carrier Aggregation mode (please see ORS Duo Mode parameter)

nodeb.title: gNB Parameters
nodeb.description: Parameters not related to a single cell but to the gNB

management.title: ORS Management Parameters
management.description: Parameters which are not related to radio, such as promise thresholds, statistical collection, log verbosity etc...
